metadata.title: CVE-2019-20018 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A stack-based buffer over-read was discovered in ReadNextCell in mat5.c inmatio 1.5.17.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20018` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmatio11 - 1.5.19-2
matio-tools - 1.5.19-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmatio package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.19-2').
